title: Formation
body: Developed a mobile application for task management using Swift and SwiftUI. Implemented features such as user authentication, data synchronization, and push notifications.

title: Jobuco
body: Led the design and development of a web application for e-commerce using React and Node.js. Integrated payment gateways, order tracking, and real-time analytics.

title: Social
body: Collaborated with a team to create a machine learning model for predictive analytics in the healthcare sector. Used Python and TensorFlow to analyze large datasets and improve accuracy.

title: Formation
body: Worked on a blockchain-based system for secure and transparent voting. Developed smart contracts and tested the system under various scenarios to ensure security and reliability.

title: Jobuco
